sparkling_gift.name: Sparkling Gesture
sparkling_gift.summary: Find a glittering keepsake that Alicia can gift to Laura.
sparkling_gift.description: Alicia wants to surprise Laura with a shimmering token. She believes a rare teardrop crystal from the lower tunnels would be perfect.
objectives: Locate a Glittering Teardrop in the dungeon.
Return it to Alicia so she can craft a gift for Laura.

golden_promise.name: Golden Promise
golden_promise.summary: Secure an ornate ring so Laura can work with new material.
golden_promise.description: Laura needs an unmarked golden band taken from a rare undead. She is willing to pay well for anyone brave enough to retrieve it.
objectives: Acquire an Untarnished Signet from the depths.
Deliver the ring to Laura at her forge.

silent_shipment.name: The Silent Shipment
silent_shipment.description: The Gate Guard is worried about a shipment that never arrived. He suspects someone in town might know more.
objectives: Ask around town about the shipment.
Speak to Alicia about any strange sightings.
Return to the Gate Guard with your findings.

scholar_request.name: A Scholar's Plea
scholar_request.summary: Recover an ancient tome from the sunken city.
scholar_request.description: Scholar Aris believes knowledge of the world's past lies in the Sunken City. He seeks an Old Tome.

geraldo_collection.name: Geraldo's Rare Find
geraldo_collection.summary: Find an Obsidian Shard for Geraldo.
geraldo_collection.description: Geraldo has heard of a rare volcanic glass found deep in the Magma Core.
objectives: Hunt Flauros or search the Magma Core.

lost_ring.name: The Lost Wedding Ring
lost_ring.description: Laura finished the ring for Raphael, but she lost it during a summoning mishap in the dungeon.
objectives: Search Floor 4 for the Lost Ring.

alicia_anxiety.name: Fraying Nerves
alicia_anxiety.description: Alicia is spiraling. She needs reassurance and perhaps a calming tea.
objectives: Find Calming Herbs in the dungeon (Drop from Plant type?).

beast_depths.name: The Beast of the Depths
beast_depths.description: A powerful Naga is terrorizing the lower levels. Put an end to it.
objectives: Kill the Naga Matriarch on Floor 9.

magma_core.name: Heart of Fire
magma_core.description: The blacksmith needs a Magma Core to forge a legendary weapon.
objectives: Defeat Salamanders in the Magma Core.
Bring it to the Weapon Shop.

yukio_duel.name: The Rivalry
yukio_duel.description: Yukio has challenged you to a duel to prove who is the superior summoner.

daphne_memory.name: Faded Memories
daphne_memory.description: Daphne feels she has forgotten something important. A locket, perhaps?
objectives: Find the Old Locket on Floor 4.

void_whispers.name: Void Whispers
void_whispers.description: Aris hears whispers from below the Magma Core. Investigate Floor 13.

dragon_slayer.name: Dragon Slayer
dragon_slayer.description: The dragon on Floor 12 has awoken. It must be stopped before it breaches the surface.

traitor_town.name: The Traitor
traitor_town.description: Someone is feeding information to the cultists. Find proof.
objectives: Find the Incriminating Note in the Gambling Den.

final_descent.name: The Final Descent
final_descent.description: The source of the corruption lies at the bottom. The Void King must fall.
